author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: Candid Water Cooler Pte Ltd v United Overseas Bank Ltd
counsel: Lim Chor Pee and Tan Yin Tze (Chor Pee & Partners) for the plaintiffs; Hri Kumar and Tham Feei Sy (Drew & Napier LLC) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Appeals/Leave/Application for leave to appeal/Whether trial judge's substantive decision containing prima facie case of error of law or case concerning issue of importance upon which determination of Court of Appeal would be to public's advantage/Section 34(2)(a) Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Rev Ed)
